alert.note: Alert for Bolivar; Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 24 at 6:59PM CDT until March 24 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Washington County in northwestern Mississippi... Bolivar County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 659 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Jersey Point, or 13 miles southeast of Rohwer, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Benoit around 705 PM CDT. Renova around 725 PM CDT. Mound Bayou around 730 PM CDT. Shelby around 735 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Winstonville, Beulah, Pace, Duncan and Merigold. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
